headline: Allstate Announces October 2024 Catastrophe Losses
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., November 21, 2024--The Allstate Corporation (NYSE: ALL) today announced estimated catastrophe losses for the month of October of $286 million or $226 million, after-tax, including $102 million, pre-tax, from Hurricane Milton and unfavorable reserve reestimates of $144 million, pre-tax, related to Hurricane Helene, primarily in Georgia, South Carolina and North Carolina. Total catastrophe losses for October year-to-date were $4.84 billion or $3.82 billion, after-tax.
